attributes.action: Take military action against Iran to gain release of our soldiers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The governmet should be taking immediate military action against Iran in response to the unlawful capture of our service men and woman. We should also be arresting all Iranian citizens and holding them until this matter is resolved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
